name: Platform Panic!
description:
Platform Panic! is a multiplayer game for two players, who go head to head and step on as many platforms as they can in 1 minute! Whoever has the most platforms of their color at the end of the match, wins!

Jump, dash, and tackle your opponents to win!

P1 Controls:

  • A - Left
  • D - Right
  • G - Jump
  • H - Dash

P2 Controls:

  • Left Arrow - Left
  • Right Arrow - Right
  • Numpad 0 - Jump
  • Numpad Period (.) - Dash

Any and all donations go straight back into this game's development. Thank you for any gifts you can give!

Music: bensound.com (support their music!)

For more information or help, contact me at artninjackson@gmail.com.

Version 0.1
